site.name: Frankencoin
site.title: Frankencoin - Swiss Franc Stablecoin (ZCHF)
site.description: Frankencoin (ZCHF) is a Swiss franc stablecoin backed by cryptocurrency collateral. Used for payments, business operations, and decentralized finance across Switzerland and globally.
site.keywords: Frankencoin, ZCHF, Swiss Franc stablecoin, cryptocurrency payments, DeFi Switzerland, digital CHF, blockchain payments, Swiss stablecoin
site.author: Frankencoin Association
